thread.title: There’s New Reason to Be Worried That Trump Will Slash Funding to Violence Against Women Programs

author: Claire Landsbaum
title: There’s New Reason to Be Worried That Trump Will Slash Funding to Violence Against Women Programs
text: The Violence Against Women Act, which was passed in 1994, currently administers 25 grant programs aimed at helping women who become victims of violence. According to the Department of Justice website , those grants funnel money to programs “designed to develop the nation’s capacity to reduce domestic... More »
